mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT l.lightning_no ,l.lightning_title ,c.class_name ,l.food_no FROM lightningList l LEFT OUTER JOIN codeTable c ON c.class_no = l.class_no WHERE c.class_no=1 AND l.lightning_status='모집중' ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT DISTINCT d.dojang_no ,d.dojang_title ,c.class_name ,d.food_no FROM dojangList d LEFT OUTER JOIN codeTable c ON c.class_no = d.class_no WHERE c.class_no=3 AND d.dojang_status='모집중' ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT DISTINCT r.restaurant_name ,r.restaurant_address ,p.photo_newFileName ,restaurant_no FROM restaurant r LEFT OUTER JOIN comment c ON r.restaurant_no = c.idx LEFT OUTER JOIN photo p ON p.idx = c.comment_no JOIN food f ON r.food_no = f.food_no WHERE restaurant_info = "영업중" ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT DISTINCT g.review_title,g.review_content,m.member_name,groupReview_no ,(SELECT photo_newFileName FROM photo p WHERE p.class_no=9 AND p.idx = (SELECT profile_no FROM profile f WHERE f.member_id =g.member_id)) AS photo_newFileName ,l.lightning_title ,d.dojang_title FROM groupReview g JOIN codeTable c ON g.class_no = c.class_no LEFT OUTER JOIN lightningList l ON l.class_no = c.class_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dojangList d ON d.class_no = c.class_no LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON g.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT m.member_id, l.lightning_title, c.class_name, l.food_no, l.eat_speed, l.lightning_no FROM `member` m LEFT OUTER JOIN profile p ON m.member_id = p.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN food f ON p.food_no = f.food_no LEFT OUTER JOIN lightningList l ON f.food_no = l.food_no LEFT OUTER JOIN codeTable c ON l.class_no = c.class_no WHERE l.food_no = p.food_no AND l.lightning_status='모집중' AND m.member_id = #{param1} ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT m.member_id, d.dojang_title, c.class_name, d.food_no, d.eat_speed, d.dojang_no FROM `member` m LEFT OUTER JOIN profile p ON m.member_id = p.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN food f ON p.food_no = f.food_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dojangList d ON f.food_no = d.food_no LEFT OUTER JOIN codeTable c ON d.class_no = c.class_no WHERE d.food_no = p.food_no AND d.dojang_status='모집중' AND m.member_id = #{param1} ORDER BY RAND()
